Name: constrain_team_size_max
Description: Team size must not exceed 9 members

Name: constrain_team_size_min
Description: Team size must be at least 5 members

Name: constrain_project_budget
Description: The total project budget cannot be exceeded

Name: require_active_worker
Description: Workers assigned to tasks must have an 'active' status

Name: sprint_story_points_le_velocity
Description: The sum of story points in a sprint cannot exceed the team's average velocity

Name: require_acceptance_criteria
Description: User stories must have defined acceptance criteria to be included in a sprint

Name: prefer_high_priority_features
Description: May-match condition to favor features with high priority

Name: avoid_low_priority_stories
Description: Cannot-match condition to avoid user stories with very low priority

Name: require_certified_skills
Description: For critical tasks, the worker's skill must be certified

Name: require_feature_documentation
Description: A feature must have its documentation before release

Name: task_must_not_be_blocked
Description: A task cannot be worked on if its status is 'blocked'

Name: sprint_must_be_active
Description: Tasks can only be added to a sprint with status 'active'

Name: limit_sprint_backlog_effort
Description: Total estimated effort for a sprint backlog must not exceed a defined threshold
